doc: Used to dictate the style that a uses to layout the buttons it contains. (See also: and ).

members.doc: Buttons are evenly spread across the box.
members.name: spread

members.doc: Buttons are placed at the edges of the box.
members.name: edge

members.doc: Buttons are grouped towards the start of the box, (on the left for a HBox, or the top for a VBox).
members.name: start

members.doc: Buttons are grouped towards the end of the box, (on the right for a HBox, or the bottom for a VBox).
members.name: end

members.doc: Buttons are centered in the box. Since 2.12.
members.name: center

members.doc: Buttons expand to fill the box. Since 3.12.
members.name: expand

name: ButtonBoxStyle
